title: Morgan Stanley, Wells Fargo, HDFC among Nexus Select units buyers
description: Morgan Stanley Asia Singapore and HDFC Flexicap Fund were among investors that bought Nexus Select Trust units valued at over ₹4,354 crore from Blackstone. This transaction reduced Blackstone's stake in the REIT from 43.1% to 22%. Units sold through open market block deals were priced at ₹138 each, slightly above the floor price.
